info.description: API to book and manage coupon or dividend transactions
info.title: Coupon/Dividend transactions

post.summary: Creates and manages coupon or dividend transactions
post.description: Creates and manages coupon or dividend transactions

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

correspondentTransactionCurrency.description: Currency in which the settlement would be processed.

correspondentCashAccountType.description: Type of cash account for the correspondent

shareSecurityNumber.description: Security identifier used in the transaction

accountingDate.description: Input Trade date or Value date or accounting date. Depends on the feature that is used

executionDate.description: The ex-date, or ex-dividend date, is the date on or after which a security is traded without a previously declared dividend or distribution.

paymentDate.description: Trade Date in case of income transaction like coupon or dividend, Execution date for Dividend announcement and Corporate Action

exchangeRateCorrespondent.description: Exchange rate applied. (if Null : calculated by MF)

localNetAmount.description: Amount of settlement as part of the transaction

amountOfRecoverableTaxes.description: Recoverable tax amount on Income , type 1

unrecoverableTaxesAmount.description: Unrecoverable tax amount on Income , type 1

contractNumber.description: Tax lot number to identify tax lots based on acquisition date

correspondentNumber.description: Correspondent bank where the cash proceeds from the transaction would be settled

depositaryNumber.description: Custodian where the units of the transaction would be lodged

cfdExternalReferenceNumber.description: External reference number of the CFD

securitySourceIdentification.description: Relates to Identifier codes of security,Provider,Thirdparty and industry etc

externalSecurityIdentification.description: The External identification code for Security like 01 for Telekurs, 03 for Sedol. Also used for other provider identifiers

prectax.description: Recoverable tax percentage on Income , type 1

unrecoverableTaxesPercentage.description: Unrecoverable tax percentage on Income , type 1

prectax2.description: Recoverable tax percentage on Income , type 2

unrecoverableTaxesPercentage2.description: Unrecoverable tax percentage on Income , type 2

correspondentCommissionPercentage.description: The commission percentage of the income is defined

amountOfRecoverableTaxes2.description: Recoverable tax amount on Income , type 2

unrecoverableTaxesAmount2.description: Unrecoverable tax amount on Income , type 2

kestAmount.description: Unit amount of Tax , Type 1. This is also used for KEST , which is a witholding tax on German income payments to foreign investment funds

kostAmount.description: Unit amount of Tax , Type 2. This is also used for KOST , which is a witholding tax on German income payments to foreign investment funds

unitAmountInSecurityCurrency.description: Denotes the per unit amount in the security currency or the quoted currency

securityPrice.description: The unit price of an instrument which is being transacted.

percentageTaxOnFrankedDividend.description: Franked tax percentage on the dividend income

frankingCredits.description: Franking credit Amount booked on the income

grossAmount.description: The Gross amount 1 of the income

conduitForeignIncome.description: Conduit Foreign Income percentage. CFI is ultimately received by a foreign resident through one or more interposed Australian corporate tax entities

conduitForeignIncomeAmount.description: Conduit Foreign Income Amount. CFI is ultimately received by a foreign resident through one or more interposed Australian corporate tax entities

percentageFrankedIncome.description: Determines the percentage of Franked income for Franking credit

percentageTaxOnSeclen.description: Security lending tax percentage on the income

fees1.description: Rate of Fees charged on Income , type of fee 1

fees2.description: Percentage of Fees charged on Income , type of fee 2

amountOfTaxes1.description: Amount of Tax payable on the income , type of tax 1

amountOfTaxes2.description: Amount of Tax payable on the income , type of tax 2

percentOfFatcaTaxes1.description: Rate of FATCA Tax payable on the income. FATCA is taxation based on US residence

creationTransactionFees.description: Fee amount on the transaction creation

percentageTaxOnFatca2.description: Rate of FATCA Tax recoverable on the income. FATCA is taxation based on US residence

transactionFeesAmount.description: This field denotes the fee amount of the transaction

flgNonAccStatus.description: Flag to denote whether the security is in a defaulted status

flg45Day.description: Flag to denote if a security ( Trans Tasman security) needs to be included in 45 Day reporting whose ccy is different than AUD.

mortgageManualSettlementFlag.description: Flag to determine if the provision on a security lending transaction should be accrued in the NAV
